ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , 'Corporate(Unregistered)') , ISBLANK(NameofUnregisteredCorporate_LeadSource__c) , $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the name of the unregistered corporate(Opportunity).
